text:
If output of Document Type declaration is disabled by applying
setOmitDocumentType(true) to the OutputFormat, declarations from the internal
subset are still printed, if an internal subset is present. I think, this is
clearly an error, since it results in non-wellformed output.
I tracked down the error to the file BaseMarkupSerializer.java and patched it to
suppress output of all declarations when DOCTYPE output is disabled. This made
the problem disappear.
creator: teege@in.tum.de
